item.title: Suspected food poisoning kills mom, 2 kids at popular tourist site
item.description: Two children and their mother have died after eating street food at a popular Istanbul tourist site, Turkish officials said.

item.title: FDA's plan to boost cheaper copycat drugs could stall at patent office
item.description: The FDA's push for lower-cost medicines looks good on paper, but the patent office under President Trump may be going in the opposite direction.
